Properties.Name: g1
Properties.Description: Changes the colour theme of certain backgrounds

Properties.Name: g2
Properties.Description: Changes the background pattern of certain renders

Properties.Name: g3
Properties.Description: Choose whether or not to use driver avatars on certain renders. By selecting (Custom Avatars) the theme use driver name field: (Name), and the theme will search for images named after the name you have given to drivers. Example: (Name): Dark373 avatar image name: Dark373

Properties.Name: g4
Properties.Description: Change the size of the league logo

Properties.Name: g5
Properties.Description: Change the displayed name of the season. (Category) refers to the assignable league categories when right-clicking on a season.

Properties.Name: name1
Properties.Description: Changes which name fields are used. When (Full Name) is active, both (Name) & (RealName) will be used.

Properties.Name: name2
Properties.Description: Changes the order of name fields on renders. When ative, (Real Name) will become before (Name): Only works when (Full Name) is active.

Properties.Name: cal1
Properties.Description: Spilts the total rounds in two columns. Toggle off for all rounds to render in a single column; Advised for very short seasons.

Properties.Name: cal2
Properties.Description: Corrects the round count for seasons with non-championship races. Set value to 1 if one none-championship race is present in your season etc.

Properties.Name: cal3
Properties.Description: Changes the font size of the header text. Advised for languages with longer translations of (calendar).

Properties.Name: gri1
Properties.Description: Changes the width of the bar. Select a greater number, if driver names are too long to fit.

Properties.Name: gri2
Properties.Description: Renders pole time and the relavtive gap to the pole sitter.
